text: Ezɨ Judan Atrivim Ahasia, Atrivim Joramɨn garima, an aremegha gɨvazɨ, a uan karisɨn ikia egha ara Bethaganɨn nguibar ekiamɨn ghu. Ezɨ Jehu uan mɨdorozir gumaziba ko Ahasian agɨntɨsi, egha Jehu kamaghɨn mɨdorozir gumazibav gɨa ghaze, “Ia uaghan a gasegh!” Ezɨ a uan karisɨn ghua Gurɨn mɨghsɨamɨn ghuavanadima, me Ipleamɨn nguibamɨn boroghɨn a gase. Ezɨ Ahasia bar ara ghua Megidon nguibar ekiamɨn ghugha gɨn areme.
